Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Muñoz Gutiérrez Martín on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Muñoz Gutiérrez Martín is a 34 year old Investment Director from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Muñoz Gutiérrez Martín is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Muñoz completed his secondary education at IES Federico García Lorca Granada in 2008.
Muñoz received his degree from Pompeu Fabra University in 2015.
Occupation History:
Muñoz Gutiérrez Martín is a seasoned professional with over 11 years of experience.
At CaixaBank S.A., Muñoz Gutiérrez Martín held the position of Family Office Manager from 2014 to 2018, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Investment Director at Banco Santander S.A. in 2020, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 50000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns townhouse in Córdoba, where he resides. It is worth 792000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Guadalajara worth 2260000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1790000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Investment Banker, in 2020.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
